author: peter l
title: park hyatt is wonderful
text: great stay..a little bit confusing with parking of car and pickup of car. i was told to wait for the car on the 58th street entrance(which locks behind you) waited for the car.it never came because you needed to walk to the left to the garage.never explained so it was confusing.
